com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya

Class SystemUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.SystemUtils

  • public class SystemUtils
extends Object
    Author:
    Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SystemUtils.OperatingSystem
      This is a large, but certainly not exhausitive, list of operating systems.
      static class  SystemUtils.OperatingSystemCategory
      This is an attempt to classify values from SystemUtils.OperatingSystem, and should be considered highly subjective.

      • SystemUtils

        public SystemUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentOperatingSystem

        public static SystemUtils.OperatingSystem getCurrentOperatingSystem()
        Via static initialisation, the current operating system is discovered. Access that value with this method. In rare cases where it is not possible identify the current operating system via system property os.name, a reference to SystemUtils.OperatingSystem.UNKNOWN is returned.
        Returns:
        current operating system or SystemUtils.OperatingSystem.UNKNOWN
        See Also:
        SystemUtils.OperatingSystem, SystemUtils.OperatingSystem.getCategory(), SystemUtils.OperatingSystemCategory, checkCurrentOperatingSystemCategory(OperatingSystemCategory...)

      • checkCurrentOperatingSystem

        public static SystemUtils.OperatingSystem checkCurrentOperatingSystem(SystemUtils.OperatingSystem... osArr)
        Tests if the current operating system matches any one of a list.

        Example:

         SystemUtils.checkCurrentOperatingSystem(
     SystemUtils.OperatingSystem.WINDOWS_XP,
     SystemUtils.OperatingSystem.WINDOWS_VISTA,
     SystemUtils.OperatingSystem.WINDOWS_7,
     SystemUtils.OperatingSystem.WINDOWS_8);
        Parameters:
        osArr - list of operating systems to match
        Returns:
        current operating system
        See Also:
        getCurrentOperatingSystem(), checkCurrentOperatingSystemCategory(OperatingSystemCategory...)

      • checkCurrentOperatingSystemCategory

        public static SystemUtils.OperatingSystemCategory checkCurrentOperatingSystemCategory(SystemUtils.OperatingSystemCategory... catArr)
        Tests if the current operating system category matches any one of a list.

        Example:

         SystemUtils.checkCurrentOperatingSystemCategory(
     SystemUtils.OperatingSystemCategory.WINDOWS,
     SystemUtils.OperatingSystemCategory.UNIX);
        Parameters:
        catArr - list of categories to match
        Returns:
        current category
        See Also:
        getCurrentOperatingSystem(), checkCurrentOperatingSystem(OperatingSystem...)
